description: This file provides PHP API functions to access the Data Model, including retrieving and setting parameters, managing object instances, and interacting with external extension APIs for the CCSP Data Model.

methods.name: DmGetStrsWithRootObj
methods.description: Retrieves multiple parameter values from the data model using the specified root object and parameter name array.

methods.name: DmSetStrsWithRootObj
methods.description: Sets multiple parameter values in the data model under the specified root object.

methods.name: DmGetInstanceIds
methods.description: Retrieves the instance IDs under a specified object table.

methods.name: DmAddObj
methods.description: Adds a new instance under a specified object table.

methods.name: DmDelObj
methods.description: Removes an object instance specified by its object name.
